mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StockStatistics(id, stockcode, avgCost, avg5dCost, avg10dCost, avg21dCost, avg62dCost, avgShare, avg10dVolume, avg21dVolume, tradingDate) VALUES(#{id}, #{stockcode}, #{avgCost}, #{avg5dCost}, #{avg10dCost}, #{avg21dCost}, #{avg62dCost}, #{avgShare}, #{avg10dVolume}, #{avg21dVolume}, #{tradingDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE avgCost=#{avgCost}, avg5dCost=#{avg5dCost}, avg10dCost=#{avg10dCost}, avg21dCost=#{avg21dCost}, avg62dCost=#{avg62dCost}, avgShare=#{avgShare},avg10dVolume=#{avg10dVolume}, avg21dVolume=#{avg21dVolume}
